00019       public static string StringFromCSharpLiteral(string source)
00020       {
00021          StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(source.Length);
00022          int pos = 0;
00023 
00024          while (pos < source.Length)
00025          {
00026             char c = source[pos];
00027             if (c == '\\')
00028             {
00029                pos++;
00030 
00031                if (pos >= source.Length)
00032                   throw new ArgumentException("Missing escape sequence");
00033 
00034                switch (source[pos])
00035                {
00036                   case '\'':
00037                      c = '\'';
00038                      break;
00039                   case '\"':
00040                      c = '\"';
00041                      break;
00042                   case '\\':
00043                      c = '\\';
00044                      break;
00045                   case '0':
00046                      c = '\0';
00047                      break;
00048                   case 'a':
00049                      c = '\a';
00050                      break;
00051                   case 'b':
00052                      c = '\b';
00053                      break;
00054                   case 'f':
00055                      c = '\f';
00056                      break;
00057                   case 'n':
00058                      c = '\n';
00059                      break;
00060                   case 'r':
00061                      c = '\r';
00062                      break;
00063                   case 't':
00064                      c = '\t';
00065                      break;
00066                   case 'v':
00067                      c = '\v';
00068                      break;
00069                   case 'x':
00070                      StringBuilder hexa = new StringBuilder(10);
00071                      pos++;
00072 
00073                      if (pos >= source.Length)
00074                         throw new ArgumentException("Missing escape sequence");
00075 
00076                      c = source[pos];
00077 
00078                      if (Char.IsDigit(c) || (c >= 'a' && c <= 'f') || (c >= 'A' && c <= 'F'))
00079                      {
00080                         hexa.Append(c);
00081                         pos++;
00082 
00083                         if (pos < source.Length)
00084                         {
00085                            c = source[pos];
00086 
00087                            if (Char.IsDigit(c) || (c >= 'a' && c <= 'f') || (c >= 'A' && c <= 'F'))

00089                               hexa.Append(c);
00090                               pos++;
00091

00093                               {
00094                                  c = source[pos];

00098                                     hexa.Append(c);
00099                                     pos++;
00100 
00101                                     if (pos < source.Length)
00102                                     {
00103                                        c = source[pos];

00105                                        if (Char.IsDigit(c) || (c >= 'a' && c <= 'f') || (c >= 'A' && c <= 'F'))
00106                                        {
00107                                           hexa.Append(c);
00108                                           pos++;
00109                                        }
00110                                     }
00111                                  }
00112                               }
00113                            }
00114                         }
00115                      }
00116

00118                      pos--;
00119                      break;
00120                   case 'u':
00121                      pos++;
00122 
00123                      if (pos + 3 >= source.Length)
00124                         throw new ArgumentException("Unrecognized escape sequence");
00125 
00126                      try
00127                      {
00128                         uint charValue = UInt32.Parse(source.Substring(pos, 4), NumberStyles.HexNumber);
00129                         c = (char)charValue;
00130                         pos += 3;
00131                      }
00132                      catch (SystemException)
00133                      {
00134                         throw new ArgumentException("Unrecognized escape sequence");
00135                      }
00136                      break;
00137                   case 'U':
00138                      pos++;
00139 
00140                      if (pos + 7 >= source.Length)
00141                         throw new ArgumentException("Unrecognized escape sequence");
00142 
00143                      try
00144                      {
00145                         uint charValue = UInt32.Parse(source.Substring(pos, 8), NumberStyles.HexNumber);
00146 
00147                         if (charValue > 0xffff)
00148                            throw new ArgumentException("Unrecognized escape sequence");
00149 
00150                         c = (char)charValue;
00151                         pos += 7;
00152                      }
00153                      catch (SystemException)
00154                      {
00155                         throw new ArgumentException("Unrecognized escape sequence");
00156                      }
00157                      break;
00158                   default:
00159                      throw new ArgumentException("Unrecognized escape sequence");
00160                }
00161             }
00162 
00163             pos++;
00164             sb.Append(c);
00165          }
00166

00175       public static string StringFromVerbatimLiteral(string source)
00176       {
00177          StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(source.Length);
00178          int pos = 0;
00179 
00180          while (pos < source.Length)
00181          {
00182             char c = source[pos];
00183 
00184             if (c == '\"')
00185             {
00186                pos++;
00187 
00188                if (pos >= source.Length)
00189                   throw new ArgumentException("Missing escape sequence");
00190 
00191                if (source[pos] == '\"')
00192                   c = '\"';
00193                else
00194                   throw new ArgumentException("Unrecognized escape sequence");
00195             }
00196 
00197             pos++;
00198             sb.Append(c);
00199          }
00200 
00201          return sb.ToString();
00202       }

00209       public static char CharFromCSharpLiteral(string source)
00210       {
00211          string result = StringFromCSharpLiteral(source);
00212 
00213          if (result.Length != 1)
00214             throw new ArgumentException("Invalid char literal");
00215 
00216          return result[0];
00217       }
